Articles.Content:
Hello veteran pilots! I wanted to introduce myself to this forum, since I've had the game for a while already and sort of started to get a bit monotone.

I think i started playing with 0.14, but I hadn't put much interest into it then, but now I find myself quite addicted to it!

Well, as a start, IÃ‚Â´d like to introduce you my newest (space)plane!

It is extremely smooth, and I've got it to go for over 500km over land, but surely it can go farther. The cruise height is at 6000m, and with a trim of four upwards and SAS on, it can get to the next continent very easily!

Im trying to improve it, so if anyone have any suggestions, they are greatly appreciated!

Unfortunately, Bill died in a failed landing

I havent tried getting it into orbit (probably it cant), but i might do it one of these days!

Here's the craft file, right click and "save as" http://dl.dropbox.com/u/45587398/SP-1000%20Mk2.craft

Edited August 9, 2012 by sal_vager
Added craft link

Hi ramipro, that's a very nice looking aircraft, how about you upload your .craft file so others can try it out?

Use Mediafire or dropbox, you won't be able to attach a file directly until your 10th post.

Thanks! Here you go: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/45587398/SP-1000%20Mk2.craft (I don't know why it opens as a text file)

Lucky me i already had a dropbox account!

The only thing you should know is that when taking off, thereÃ‚Â´s an extra engine on the tail, it helps with taking off.
Seeing as you can't edit your own posts yet I'll add the link to your original post for you, it'll make it easier for other players to find it
Thank you! Are there many players from Europe?
Apparently there are 90 european players in irc right now, at #kspofficial
How do I connect there? I'll probably connect tomorrow anyways, it's getting late here! Thanks again!
You'll need an irc client, I use xchat, and you'll need to connect to esper.net, once there you will want to join the channel #kspofficial
